title: Prepare for Apple’s ‘Peek performance’ event with special wallpapers and 9to5Mac merch
content:
If you’re a fan of the colorful and mysterious artwork Apple is using to tease next week’s “Peek performance” special event, you’re in luck. Wallpapers inspired by this design are now available, and we’ve even made a special edition 9to5Mac Shirt to commemorate the first event of 2022…

more…
